name: Zombie Bonk!
description:
Zombie Bonk!

Use a mouse to move, click to slam the hammer on humans. Aim wisely, the hammer is heavy!

Part of the three day International Educations Game Jam 2021. 

Students from Gothenburg, Sweden, and Utrecht, Netherlands.

Credits group 19 Artists

Julian Hoogendoorn - NE

Jennifer Lewin - SE

Linde Maurer- NE

Programmers

Patrick Kramer - NE

Senna Krebbers - NE

Emilie Vogel - SE

Music

Epidemic Sound

SFX  here & here

Thanks for playing! Let us know in the comments what you think!
